entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing rain mixed with snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of freezing rain mixed with light snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snow level rising to 600 metres before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
